content.question: Which of the following aspects of classical conditioning is demonstrated by Quadrant 1 in the figure?

choices.label: Conditioned response to a conditioned stimulus.
Unconditioned response to an unconditioned stimulus.
Spontaneous recovery of a conditioned response.

content.answer: Unconditioned response to an unconditioned stimulus.

skill.text: 3.A: Identify psychology-related concepts in descriptions or representations of data.
